original_title: Sri Lanka rupee at 298.50/300 to dollar, bond yields steady at open
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka spot to the US dollar at 298.50/300.00 rupees while bonds and bill were steady on Monday, dealers said.
The Spot US dollar closed at 296.50/298.00 rupees on Friday.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted at 23.20/50 percent, steady from 23.20/35 percent a day earlier.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 was quoted at 24.25/75 percent, down from 24.40/70 percent from yesterday.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2025 was quoted at 26.00/25 percent, steady from 25.75/26.00 percent on Thursday.
A one-year bill was quoted at 18.25/19.00 percent down from 18.25/75 percent from its last close.
